001
002/**
003 * Décrivez votre classe Quest ici.
004 *
005 * @author (votre nom)
006 * @version (un numéro de version ou une date)
007 */
008public class Quest {
009    private String aName; // words are separated with "-"
010    private String aDescription; // words are separated with "-"
011    private String aGoal; // finditem, gosomewhere, giveitem, writeletter, talkto
012    private String aObject;
013    private String aTarget;
014    private int aReward;
015    private int aExp;
016    
017    // createquest nom_description_finditem_intemname_null_10_10
018    // createquest nom_description_gosomewhere_roomname_null_10_10
019    // createquest nom_description_giveitem_intemname_pnjname_10_10
020    // createquest nom_description_writeletter_letter_pnjname_10_10
021    // createquest nom_description_talkto_pnjname_null_10_10
022    
023    private Item aItemQuest;
024    private Letter aLetterQuest;
025    private PNJ aPNJQuest;
026    private Room aRoomQuest;
027    
028    public Quest(final String pName, final String pDescription, final String pGoal, final String pObject, final String pTarget, final int pReward, final int pExp) {
029        this.aName = pName;
030        this.aDescription = pDescription;
031        this.aGoal = pGoal;
032        this.aObject = pObject;
033        this.aTarget = pTarget;
034        this.aReward = pReward;
035        this.aExp = pExp;
036        
037        if(this.aGoal.equals("finditem")) {
038            this.aItemQuest = GameEngine.GAME_ITEM.get(this.aObject.toLowerCase());
039        } else if(this.aGoal.equals("giveitem")) {
040            this.aItemQuest = GameEngine.GAME_ITEM.get(this.aObject.toLowerCase());
041            this.aPNJQuest = GameEngine.GAME_PNJ.get(this.aTarget.toLowerCase());
042            
043        } else if(this.aGoal.equals("writeletter")) {
044            this.aLetterQuest = null;
045            this.aPNJQuest = GameEngine.GAME_PNJ.get(this.aObject.toLowerCase());
046            
047        } else if(this.aGoal.equals("talkto")) {
048            this.aPNJQuest = GameEngine.GAME_PNJ.get(this.aObject.toLowerCase());
049        } else if(this.aGoal.equals("gosomewhere")) {
050            this.aRoomQuest = GameEngine.GAME_ROOM.get(this.aObject.toLowerCase());
051        }
052    }
053    
054    public String getName() {
055        return this.aName;
056    }
057    
058    public String getDescription() {
059        return this.aDescription;
060    }
061    
062    public String getGoal() {
063        return this.aGoal;
064    }
065    
066    public int getReward() {
067        return this.aReward;
068    }
069    
070    public int getExp() {
071        return this.aExp;
072    }
073    
074    public String getRewardsString() {
075        return this.aReward + " ¥ - " + this.aExp + " xp";
076    }
077    
078    
079    public Item getItemQuest() {
080        return this.aItemQuest;
081    }
082    
083    public Letter getLetterQuest() {
084        return this.aLetterQuest;
085    }
086    
087    public PNJ getPNJQuest() {
088        return this.aPNJQuest;
089    }
090    
091    public Room getRoomQuest() {
092        return this.aRoomQuest;
093    }
094}
